Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory51.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Heh, how's it feel to play with the Corrupted within your M.I.N.D. last night?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'm never losing to you!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'In our M.I.N.D., I have slain virus embodiments tenfold of yours.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "If it weren't for me, you would have lost control of your body from that Punishing Virus influence.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "That's how it always was, is, and always will be.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'll get you out of my head one day!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "You know this isn't possible, for—", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'I am you, and you are me...', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Accept me... And become your better self...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'When I find a way to cleanse myself of the virus, I will no longer need you!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'You were referring to... what Chrome "mentioned," weren\'t you?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Placing your hopes on uncertainty...', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "You'd be better off letting me take hold...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory76.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Only the emergency supply's recovered. The main power source of this city comes from the nuclear plant underneath.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But the supply's been cut off the grid by the virus, now it only supplies energy to the machine factory here.", 4: '3'}
{3: 'Emergency signals shimmer in ghostly blue colors within the partially revived city.'}
{3: 'It was as if the Gray Ravens were swallowed by a piece of the galaxy.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Not a single survivor...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "After so many years, there won't be anyone left.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's difficult to imagine... how half a million people managed to live in this tiny place...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'There might be no survivors, but the Corrupted still keep pouring out of here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Mid to late Post-Pandemic Age, humans thought they could make use of the serum to turn the tables with their armies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'That was until the virus began corrupting factories, turning them into breeding pools for war.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Facing a supply line of an endless Corrupted army, even the newly developed Construct technology didn't stand a chance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm certain everyone here knows full well of that hopelessness and despair.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Keep moving—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The virus is our common enemy, but we Forsaken seek to rebuild humanity with our own method.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We were the only humans who did not stand back for even a mere second. The only humans who truly share a fate with this Earth.', 4: '1'}
